title: I got LeaverBuster because of my Files being Corrupted.
body:
I was just versing my friend in League and then I got leaver buster after.

Is there any reason for this.

A punishment for something I can't control.

replies.body:
You won't gain a [Leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalty for disconnecting from a single match. It takes a trend of disconnections before you will see a penalty, and if you're continuously disconnecting, I'd recommend investigating into the reason why they're happening.

In this instance, we know that your game files were corrupted. The client likely made you run a repair, so if this issue happens again, you'll likely want to complete a clean reinstallation of League.

Let me know if you have any questions.
